languages.text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest} resistance test{/g} with a −<u>wielder's Coercion / 3</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking attacks of opportunity.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} / 3)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: 当使用此武器成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻被推到4格之外，还会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当使用此武器成功{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于装备者的<u>胁迫/3</u>。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻被推到4格之外，还会触发借机攻击。

当使用此武器成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}。若目标未能通过检定，则会立刻被推到4格之外，还会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} и в случае провала немедленно смещается на 4 клетки назад, провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(Напор персонажа / 3)</u> и в случае провала немедленно смещается на 4 клетки назад, провоцируя атаки по возможности.

Получив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(Напор персонажа / 3)</u> и в случае провала немедленно смещается на 4 клетки назад, провоцируя атаки по возможности.

Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} и в случае провала немедленно смещается на 4 клетки назад, провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}に成功した場合、ターゲットは−{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格するか、即座に4セル離れた場所に移動して、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発するかである。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、ターゲットは-<u>使い手の強制力/3</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければ、即座に4セル離れた場所に移動して、機会攻撃を誘発する。

この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}に成功した場合、ターゲットは−{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格するか、即座に4セル離れた場所に移動して、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発するかである。

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} con esta arma, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} o alejarse 4 casillas, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} con esta arma, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>(Coacción del portador / 3)</u> o alejarse 4 casillas, provocando ataques de oportunidad.

Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} con esta arma, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} o alejarse 4 casillas, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} bestehen, sonst wird es sofort 4 Felder weit wegbewegt und provoziert dabei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −<u>Waffenführer-Zwang /3</u> bestehen, da es ansonsten sofort 4 Felder weggestoßen wird und Gelegenheitsangriffe provoziert.

Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} bestehen, sonst wird es sofort 4 Felder weit wegbewegt und provoziert dabei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté à l'aide de cette arme, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680}, faute de quoi elle est immédiatement déplacée de 4 cases, ce qui provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
